title: Grand-Opening: Boutique Central Seville Getaway with Daily Breakfast
description:
Conveniently located in Seville's bohemian and multicultural Encarnacion-Regina neighbourhood, this newly opened hotel invites you to experience contemporary luxury Mediterranean style. Overlooking the avant-garde Setas de Sevilla in the adjacent square, guests can enjoy typical Spanish tapas alongside locals. The rooms showcase intricate Mudéjar tiles, reflecting the city's rich heritage and offering a tranquil retreat in the energetic southern capital.

Wander through the labyrinth streets of the Santa Cruz neighbourhood, discover the enchanting Royal Alcázar of Seville or stroll along the picturesque banks of the Guadalquivir River. With flamenco performances echoing through the city and the majestic Giralda tower gracing the skyline, Ocean Drive Sevilla invites you to discover the vibrant soul of Seville's metropolis.
offer_address: Plaza de la Encarnación 15, Seville, Andalucia 41003, Spain

title: Moroccan-Inspired Adults-Only Seville Allure near Alcazar Palace with Daily Breakfast
description: Immerse yourself in the romantic allure of Seville at Triana House Boutique Hotel, an adults-only sanctuary nestled in the city's historic district. This intimate retreat marries Andalusian charm with modern luxury, offering just seven sustainably designed rooms, a classic Sevillian courtyard and an artisan breakfast. Just a stone's throw from the iconic Plaza de España and the majestic Seville Cathedral, you'll be perfectly positioned to explore the city's rich culture and history. Savour authentic Spanish tapas and lose yourself in the rhythm of flamenco, before returning to your eclectic abode for a moment of tranquillity.
offer_address: C. Rodrigo de Triana, 94-98, 41010 Seville, Spain

title: Historic Spanish Boutique Escape in the Heart of Seville
description: Immerse yourself in the heart of Seville at the exquisite Gravina 51 Hotel, a luxurious boutique retreat nestled within the city's historic district. This architectural gem, with its blend of traditional charm and modern elegance, is a stone's throw from iconic landmarks such as the Seville Cathedral and the Alcazar Palace. Enjoy Andalusian cuisine at Bar 51, and later unwind with a glass of wine in hand, in a city where culture, gastronomy, and luxury perfectly converge.
